title: Failed to process annotation
body:
### Description
Got this exception on Altona (node was fully in sync):

```
2020-07-03 16:32:37.538 | P2PService-event-thread-0 | WARN  | gregateAttestationTopicHandler | Encountered exception while processing message for topic /eth2/fdca39b0/beacon_aggregate_and_proof/ssz_snappy
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
	at tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.util.ValidatorsUtil.lambda$get_active_validator_indices$2(ValidatorsUtil.java:94) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.util.cache.NoOpCache.get(NoOpCache.java:47) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.util.ValidatorsUtil.get_active_validator_indices(ValidatorsUtil.java:91) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.util.BeaconStateUtil.get_committee_count_at_slot(BeaconStateUtil.java:597) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.util.CommitteeUtil.lambda$get_beacon_committee$2(CommitteeUtil.java:255) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.util.cache.NoOpCache.get(NoOpCache.java:47) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.util.CommitteeUtil.get_beacon_committee(CommitteeUtil.java:251) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.util.AttestationUtil.get_attesting_indices(AttestationUtil.java:117) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.util.AttestationUtil.get_indexed_attestation(AttestationUtil.java:90) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.core.ForkChoiceUtil.indexAndValidateAttestation(ForkChoiceUtil.java:384) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.core.ForkChoiceUtil.lambda$on_attestation$2(ForkChoiceUtil.java:352) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.datastructures.util.AttestationProcessingResult.ifSuccessful(AttestationProcessingResult.java:43) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.core.ForkChoiceUtil.on_attestation(ForkChoiceUtil.java:352) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.statetransition.forkchoice.ForkChoice.onAttestation(ForkChoice.java:93) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.statetransition.attestation.ForkChoiceAttestationProcessor.processAttestation(ForkChoiceAttestationProcessor.java:36) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.statetransition.attestation.AttestationManager.onAttestation(AttestationManager.java:115) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.services.beaconchain.BeaconChainController.lambda$initP2PNetwork$6(BeaconChainController.java:396) ~[classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.gossip.topics.AggregateAttestationTopicHandler.handleMessage(AggregateAttestationTopicHandler.java:62) [classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.p2p.libp2p.gossip.GossipHandler.apply(GossipHandler.java:77) [classes/:?]
	at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.p2p.libp2p.gossip.GossipHandler.apply(GossipHandler.java:34) [classes/:?]
	at io.libp2p.pubsub.PubsubApiImpl.onNewMessage(PubsubApiImpl.kt:71) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.2-RELEASE.jar:?]
	at io.libp2p.pubsub.PubsubApiImpl.access$onNewMessage(PubsubApiImpl.kt:23) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.2-RELEASE.jar:?]
	at io.libp2p.pubsub.PubsubApiImpl$1.invoke(PubsubApiImpl.kt:55) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.2-RELEASE.jar:?]
	at io.libp2p.pubsub.PubsubApiImpl$1.invoke(PubsubApiImpl.kt:23) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.2-RELEASE.jar:?]
	at io.libp2p.pubsub.AbstractRouter.onInbound(AbstractRouter.kt:200) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.2-RELEASE.jar:?]
	at io.libp2p.etc.util.P2PService.streamInbound(P2PService.kt:149) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.2-RELEASE.jar:?]
	at io.libp2p.etc.util.P2PService$StreamHandler$channelRead$1.invoke(P2PService.kt:49) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.2-RELEASE.jar:?]
	at io.libp2p.etc.util.P2PService$StreamHandler$channelRead$1.invoke(P2PService.kt:35) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.2-RELEASE.jar:?]
	at io.libp2p.etc.util.P2PService$sam$java_lang_Runnable$0.run(P2PService.kt) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.2-RELEASE.jar:?]
	at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:515) [?:?]
	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:264) [?:?]
	at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.java:304) [?:?]
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1128) [?:?]
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:628) [?:?]
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:834) [?:?]
```

Looks like back up at `ForkChoiceUtil.indexAndValidateAttestation` `getCheckpointState` returned null and we should have deferred attestation processing because we didn't have the block it referred to but didn't?
